message: Let's split it 7:3, I'll start with a fair offer
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but still a bit more for me
You're not getting a better deal, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give in too much
You're running out of time, take it or I'll walk away!
I'm not going to give in, I'll take the risk of going to the next round
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'm going all in, I'll give you the whole thing, but only if you accept
